duties_responsibilities.duty: Grow and retain a customer portfolio, execute service delivery, and foster positive customer experiences.
Use sales persuasion, urgency, and understanding of customer challenges to meet and exceed revenue and volume expectations.
Deliver exceptional customer service through effective negotiation, conflict management, and proactive quality control.
Implement process efficiencies using customer-facing technology and leveraging internal resources.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited college or university
